curiosity.title: Curiosity Rover
curiosity.description: On August 6, 2012, the car-sized Curiosity rover landed on Mars using an audacious sky crane maneuver. Its nuclear power source enables year-round operation. Curiosity found ancient riverbeds and organic molecules, proving Mars was once habitable.
curiosity.conditionLabel: Land on Mars: Alt < 500 m, Velocity < 50 m/s
